about_the_game:
Make mini music with other players!
🎼 🎵 🎹 🎸 🥁 🎤 🎺 🎷 🐶 🐱 📦

10 Second Mixtape is a casual game about teaming up to make simple songs with other real people from all over the world. Every track in the game is player-generated; absolutely nothing is prewritten. Don't worry if you're not musically inclined! There are no winners here — it's all about having fun and making silly sounds.

You start in The Venue, your favorite spot to hang out and watch bands! The bands playing are all other players' creations. Your ratings will affect how often that band is booked for shows in everyone else's games. When you start making a song, you'll be given a random instrument and bandmate, and you'll record a 10 second track.

From there, it's time to add more layers! You can pick from demo tapes sent in by other potential band members to add to your track. Finally, it's time to take this show on the road! Watch your band perform the full song live in front of their new fans. Your new 10-second song will go into the infinite playlist of bands that play at The Venue.

Rock on! 🤙

🎧 Note: Avoid using bluetooth headphones for this game — the input lag makes it hard to play precisely.
